title: When I am in Pick and Bans in Draft Pick with Friends, why am I always first pick?
body: Apparently every pick and ban with friends in draft pick I am always first pick. It does not matter what lane, or when I join, I am always first pick

replies.body:
At some point in the past ELO/MMR had something to do with it - this may no longer be the case.

Do the friends always appear in the same order?
